attributes.action: Recall for adjustment, vehicles with LED headlights, as they are dangerous
attributes.additional_details:
More and more drivers, cyclists and even pedestrians are experiencing this danger on a daily basis, and this needs to be challenged.

Along with more and more vehicles having touch-screen controls (requiring the driver to take their eyes off the road to even change the heating or air-conditioning), these LED headlights are promoting significantly more unsafe vehicles on the roads, and thus directly, more potential serious injuries and certain deaths of road users and pedestrians.
attributes.background: Review compliance and safety regulations for vehicle LED headlights.  These headlights pose a serious danger to road users and pedestrians as they frequently dazzle oncoming drivers, even when in the "dipped" mode.  SUVs have their headlights at eye-level of drivers of normal cars, making it worse.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Ban LED headlights
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233

Regulate the brightness and type of vehicle headlights allowed
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711112
